content.query:
USE good_db
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateSQLServerlessView_gold @ViewName nvarchar(100)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)
    SET @statement = 'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + @ViewName + ' AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''https://awssaledatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/Sales/' + @ViewName + ''',
    FORMAT = ''DELTA''
) AS [result]';

    
    EXEC (@statement)
END
GO

GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateSQLServerlessView_gold_pro @ViewName nvarchar(100)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)
    SET @statement = 'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + @ViewName + ' AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''https://awssaledatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/Production/' + @ViewName + ''',
    FORMAT = ''DELTA''
) AS [result]';

    
    EXEC (@statement)
END
GO

GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateSQLServerlessView_gold_per @ViewName nvarchar(100)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)
    SET @statement = 'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + @ViewName + ' AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''https://awssaledatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/Person/' + @ViewName + ''',
    FORMAT = ''DELTA''
) AS [result]';

    
    EXEC (@statement)
END
GO
